sentences.en: a policy which sets out the school’s aims and objectives
sentences.cn: 清楚阐明该校各项目标的政策

sentences.en: a program that’s aimed at teenagers
sentences.cn: 对象为青少年的节目

sentences.en: Aim to have at least half a pint of milk each day.
sentences.cn: 目标是每天至少喝半品脱的牛奶。

sentences.en: Denver aimed his gun but did not shoot.
sentences.cn: 丹佛举枪瞄准，但是没有射击。

sentences.en: He exhorted his companions, "Try to accomplish your aim with diligence".
sentences.cn: 他劝诫同伴说：“要通过勤奋努力实现自己的目标。”

sentences.en: In a naval battle your aim is to sink the enemy's ship.
sentences.cn: 在海战中目标就是击沉敌船。

sentences.en: In the squash court his chief aim is to flatten me.
sentences.cn: 在壁球场上他的主要目标就是击败我。

sentences.en: My criticism wasn't aimed at you.
sentences.cn: 我的批评不是针对你的。

sentences.en: Nicholson never swerved from his aim of making pure and simple art.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔森始终坚持创作纯粹简单的艺术，从未动摇过。

sentences.en: Teamwork is required in order to achieve these aims.
sentences.cn: 完成这些目标需要团队合作。

sentences.en: The aim of discipline is to teach children to behave acceptably.
sentences.cn: 纪律的目的是教育儿童举止得体。

sentences.en: The aim of this initial meeting is to clarify the issues.
sentences.cn: 本次初步会议的目标是澄清这些问题。

sentences.en: The book's aim was to make economic theory more digestible.
sentences.cn: 该书的目的是要让经济学理论更加简单易懂。

sentences.en: The magazine's aim is to discuss topical issues within a Christian framework.
sentences.cn: 该杂志的宗旨是在基督教框架下讨论时下的热门话题。

sentences.en: The main aim of the course is to improve your writing.
sentences.cn: 这一课程的主要目的是提高写作能力。

sentences.en: The Oxford Chemistry Primers aim to cover important topics in organic chemistry.
sentences.cn: 《牛津化学初级读本》丛书旨在论述有机化学中的重要问题。

sentences.en: The ultimate aim is to expand the network further.
sentences.cn: 最终目的是为了进一步拓展该网络。

sentences.en: Their aim will be to produce as much milk as possible.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标是尽可能提高牛奶产量。

sentences.en: Their ultimate aim was a market economy for Hungary.
sentences.cn: 他们最终的目标是为匈牙利建立起市场经济体制。

sentences.en: They aim to clear every dealer from the street.
sentences.cn: 他们打算把街上所有的毒品贩子都清走。

sentences.en: They aim to cut production lead times to under 18 months.
sentences.cn: 他们力求把开发周期缩至18个月以下。

sentences.en: They are aiming to reduce unemployment by 50%.
sentences.cn: 他们正力求使失业人数下降50%。

sentences.en: We aim to finish by Friday.
sentences.cn: 我们力争星期五之前完成。

phrases.tran_cn: v. 针对；瞄准；目的在于
◎向低处瞄准(尤指拳击比赛中不道德的打法)
瞄准；盯着；注意到；以…为目标

trans.tran_en: something you hope to achieve by doing something

trans.tran_cn: 旨在，决定，力求达到，针对，瞄准
trans.tran_en: to choose the place, person etc that you want to hit or reach and point a weapon or another object towards them

trans.tran_cn: 目的在于，企图；瞄准，对准
trans.tran_en: to choose the place, person etc that you want to hit or reach and point a weapon or another object towards them

trans.tran_cn: 把…瞄准； 使针对， 使旨在
trans.tran_en: to choose the place, person etc that you want to hit or reach and point a weapon or another object towards them
